A careless dev reused a prime to generate keys for two RSA-encrypted messages. Can you recover the secret from 247647185978168508491430616278076520394904647112833268426274014079301518239915052364278033326169116206662410598778303032959634552300131505276156206314374029543119304123203235892248436154262317830947988294728991051206356333802864959?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=915930129067977270041548907429007012144446801894562943671140657321354831706708077652093042563411809605488324768056218981819732246573174994328167973340061438688831054593948301470037620337290637773008501722519578728999199926606920401, e=514413011389315987476298802294825355595900802721065277658348723589334417180838735079474454022765890823143329944579418706848367173645385368279752378634046953611090382967472422602496184855457495813610577594101458931066819814715594785

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{440menug}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 247647185978168508491430616278076520394904647112833268426274014079301518239915052364278033326169116206662410598778303032959634552300131505276156206314374029543119304123203235892248436154262317830947988294728991051206356333802864959
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=915930129067977270041548907429007012144446801894562943671140657321354831706708077652093042563411809605488324768056218981819732246573174994328167973340061438688831054593948301470037620337290637773008501722519578728999199926606920401, e=514413011389315987476298802294825355595900802721065277658348723589334417180838735079474454022765890823143329944579418706848367173645385368279752378634046953611090382967472422602496184855457495813610577594101458931066819814715594785
extra_info: p=30264337578542459650283620771685095429767947515033739653411578034534795137957615134620454311103404121831916584559799, q=30264337578542459650283620771685095429767947515033739653411578034534795137957615134620454311103404121831916584559799, Ï†(n)=915930129067977270041548907429007012144446801894562943671140657321354831706708077652093042563411809605488324768056158453144575161653874427086624603149201902793800987114641478313968550747014722542739260813897371920755536093437800804
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
